Purpose: To detect and quantify GANGLIOSIDE GQ1B IgG antibodies in human serum via ELISA as an aid in diagnosing certain neurological conditions.
Container: Plain red-top tube or serum separator tube (SST)
Equipment: ELISA kit (antigen-coated microplate, wash buffer, conjugate, substrate, stop solution, calibrators/controls), micropipettes, plate washer, plate reader (450 nm), 37Â°C incubator
